response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than what the market typically offers. Considering its value to you, we're willing to extend this exclusive opportunity for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exceptional benefits the product provides. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and deliver significant value. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
